General.Name: Camel Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Camel Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells green lead-acid and new energy lithium-ion batteries in Asia. It offers batteries for automotive, heavy commercial vehicle, golf carts, marine, and electric forklifts; and energy storage systems. The company sells its products under the Camel, Camel Energy, Hitec, and DF name. Camel Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Xiangyang, China.
